alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 6:02PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN GRANT COUNTY... At 600 PM PST, a snow squall was located 12 miles southeast of Quincy, or 19 miles west of Moses Lake, moving east at 45 mph. Visibility will drop to a quarter mile at times. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this squall. Locations impacted include... Moses Lake, Cascade Valley, Moses Lake North, George, McDonald, and Gorge Amphitheatre. This includes Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 138 and 181. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this dangerous snow squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the squall passes your location. &&
